source_objects.title: Microsoft
source_objects.description: Become proficient in Microsoft tools: Windows, Sharepoint, Excel, Word, Powerpoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, Project and more.

items.title: From Excel to Power BI

visible_instructors.title: Dr. Nitin Paranjape
visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft Most Valuable Professional for Office System
visible_instructors.name: Dr. Nitin

items.headline: Learn Power BI using the knowledge of Excel you already have. Fast, in-depth, practical, useful.
objectives_summary: Understand what is good and bad data. Good data allows you to analyze it without wasting time in clean-up.
Identify incoming data as good or bad and clean it up very fast. (unimaginably fast)
Understand how to detect inefficiency while working and how to find the most efficient approach.

items.title: Microsoft Excel - Learn MS EXCEL For DATA Analysis
items.headline: Excel: learn how Excel can be used for data analysis by creating excel project-excel app-other excel tools
objectives_summary: Learn to write down basic excel formulas
Understand how to think outside of the box to create powerful excel projects
Learn how to make basic data analysis with Excel

items.title: Excel Formulas & Functions - Find Answers in Your Excel Data

visible_instructors.title: Steve McDonald
visible_instructors.job_title: Dedicated Instructor Will Help You Excel | 300K+ Students
visible_instructors.name: Steve

items.headline: Excel Training-How to Use Formulas and Functions in Excel Spreadsheets-Learn on Excel 2010, Excel 2013, or Excel 2016
objectives_summary: Identify formulas and functions and know the difference between the two.
Locate and use any of the functions in Excel using various methods, such as the Formula Tab.
Use the 7 most important Excel functions in common spreadsheet computations.

items.title: Ultimate Excel VBA
items.headline: Programming for the Business Professional
objectives_summary: Course Goal: You will obtain practical fluency in Visual Basic for Applications (VBA) specifically as it applies to Microsoft Excel.

Course Objectives: 1) You will learn to automate and extend Excel by adding VBA projects to your workbooks. 2) You will learn to enhance, customize and extend the Excel user interface through modifications to the Excel environment, the creation of custom user forms, and the use of ActiveX controls. 3) You will learn how to respond to workbook, worksheet and application events to automate macro execution. 4) You will learn how it is possible to reach outside of Excel by way of VBA, in order to perform cross-application tasks.

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2013  Advanced. Online Excel Training Course
items.headline: Master Advanced Excel 2013 Features. Become A Expert And Learn To Use Excel Like A Pro With This Advanced Excel Training
objectives_summary: To take your basic Excel skills to the next level
To gain a solid understanding of the more powerful features and functions in Excel
To be able to use Microsoft Excel in a commercial environment

items.title: Microsoft PowerPoint in 1 Hour : Introduction to PowerPoint

visible_instructors.title: 365 Careers
visible_instructors.job_title: Creating opportunities for Business & Finance students

items.headline: Start Using Microsoft PowerPoint with Confidence - Your Shortcut For Career Success
objectives_summary: Work confidently with Microsoft PowerPoint
Create sophisticated and well-organized PowerPoint presentations

items.title: Microsoft Excel Zero to Advanced: Data Analysis & Dashboards

visible_instructors.title: Irfan Sharif
visible_instructors.job_title: Bestselling Trainer | Chartered Accountant | PwC Alumni
visible_instructors.name: Irfan

items.headline: Microsoft Excel Beginner to Advanced w/ Data Analysis, & Dashboards. Learn Pro Tips, Shortcuts, Formulas and Functions.
objectives_summary: Basics like cells, rows, and columns
Adding/deleting rows and columns
Cell formats

items.title: Comprehensive Microsoft Excel
items.headline: Discover how to use Microsoft Excel with an easy to follow tutorial series that focuses on project based learning.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to quickly and masterfully utilize Microsoft Excel, including how to: design and template worksheets, manipulate text, build complex financial models, apply conditional formatting, and be able to utilize shorts that will make using Excel an efficient process.

items.title: Time Management Training with Outlook
items.headline: Outlook can do WAY more than you use it for. Learn tons of efficient workflow tips, tricks, and tools available.

items.title: Microsoft Excel Pro Tips: Go from Beginner to Advanced Excel
items.headline: Master 75+ Excel tips to build advanced Excel skills: formulas, pivot tables, charts, data analysis & data visualization
objectives_summary: Build tools to help you automate, streamline, and absolutely revolutionize your workflow with Excel
Explore 75+ unique tips, tools and case studies that you won't find in ANY other Excel course, guaranteed
Get LIFETIME access to resources, Excel project files, quizzes, and 1-on-1 expert support

items.title: Microsoft PowerPoint - Advanced PowerPoint Training
items.headline: PowerPoint Training That Actually Works. NEW and UPDATED for Microsoft 365 (PowerPoint 2019).
objectives_summary: SHORTCUT 80% of everything you do in Microsoft PowerPoint
ELIMINATE 40% of your daily PowerPoint tasks using my proven system
LEVERAGE hidden commands and features to build your PowerPoint presentations faster

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2010: Advanced Training
items.headline: Master Advanced Excel 2010 Features. Become A Expert And Learn To Use Excel Like A Pro With This Advanced Excel Training
objectives_summary: Learn Advanced Microsoft Excel 2010 from a professional trainer from your own desk.
136 lectures (8.5 hours of content) teaching you lookups, advanced IF statements, Macros, Sparklines, and much more!
Suitable advanced Excel users. ideal for users who learn faster when shown.

items.title: Microsoft Excel -Basic Excel/ Advanced Excel Formulas
items.headline: Learn more than 80+ Excel function/Excel formulas/Excel tips for Excel 2007 to Excel 2019 with Excel examples
objectives_summary: Learn how to work with the most popular microsoft Excel functions
Build Basic Excel apps from scratch with different functions
Be able to work with different Excel function types such as date and time, finance and many others

items.title: Eye-catching presentations using PowerPoint 2013
items.headline: Improve your presentation skills and learn to effectively use PowerPoint 2013 to create eye-catching slides.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will be able to deliver an eye-catching presentation using PowerPoint 2013
Learn how to prepare a successful presentation by gathering and refining information
Learn how to create eye-catching slides using graphics, images, animations and videos in PowerPoint 2013

items.title: Excel - Microsoft Excel Beginner to Advanced [2021]
items.headline: Excel Course: Microsoft Excel From Beginner to Advanced, Ms Excel Formulas, Chart Tips & Tricks in Excel 2019/Office 365
objectives_summary: Microsoft Excel - Excel From Beginner to Advanced 5.5-hour course
Excel basics & advanced features
Focusing on Data Visualization techniques you can stand out with

items.title: Microsoft Excel 2010 Course Beginners/ Intermediate Training
items.headline: Learn to Invoke the Power of Microsoft Excel in easy to follow stages
objectives_summary: Learn Microsoft Excel 2010 from a professional trainer from your own desk.
126 lectures (9.5 hours of content) teaching you from the basic to the advanced of this powerful program
Suitable for beginners to advanced users. ideal for users who learn faster when shown.
